Text:
A/V - not the best , but better than some...

also, apparently "subbed" in the main title doesn't mean " this comes with subtitles", but ACTUALLY means " hard-coded Chinese or Korean subtitles that are pretty high up the screen"

It's not too damn difficult, surely, to write HARD-CODED subtitles???? 

Surely, TvTeam if you give the downloader as much info as possible about these torrents, then it will make for a happier internet!!!
